name: Bully Figthers - Twitch.tv Game
description:
Someone will win in this fun fighting game that supports a maximum of 500 players!

Commands Command NameDescription!joinAfter the game starts, you can join the game with this command!

You can start the game by entering your Twitch name.

Set the maximum number of players

Set player name size

Set game speed

Show player names

It preserves the size of the players' names. automatically sized according to the camera

You can start the game by pressing this button
